creator: christoph.prybila@gmail.com
text:
When creating a cluster with static membership the number of participating cluster-nodes sometimes is not static. 

Therefore it should be possible to add/remove members in such a static-membership cluster without restarting the other already running tomcat instances.

As far as I cloud tell there is currently no possibility to do that.
This would be suited as a jmx feature.

See also the mailing-list discussion

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/tomcat-users/201504.mbox/%3C552FC04E.1030605%40gmail.com%3E
